  36. (*** Position conversions. ***)

  38. (* Pair (position, line) where `position' is the position in character of *)
  39. (* the beginning of the line (first character is 0) and `line' is its *)
  40. (* number (first line number is 1). *)
  41. ‌type position = int * int

  43. (* Position of the next linefeed after `pos'. *)
  44. (* Position just after the buffer end if no linefeed found. *)
  45. (* Raise `Out_of_range' if already there. *)
  46. ‌val next_linefeed : buffer -> int -> int

  48. (* Go to next line. *)
  49. ‌val next_line : buffer -> position -> position

  51. (* Convert a position in the buffer to a line number. *)
  52. ‌val line_of_pos : buffer -> int -> position

  54. (* Convert a line number to a position. *)
  55. ‌val pos_of_line : buffer -> int -> position

  57. (* Convert a coordinate (line / column) into a position. *)
  58. (* --- The first line and column are line 1 and column 1. *)
  59. ‌val point_of_coord : buffer -> int -> int -> int

  61. (* Return the offsets of both line start and cnum for the passed position. *)
  62. ‌val start_and_cnum : buffer -> Lexing.position -> (int * int)
